includedAssets.title: Now Is Not the End
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - Now Is Not the End
includedAssets.synopsis: In 1946, Peggy Carter is working as a secretary for the Strategic Scientific Reserve, until Howard Stark asks her for help.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In 1946, Peggy Carter is working as a secretary for the Strategic Scientific Reserve, until Howard Stark asks her for help.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In 1946, Peggy Carter is working as a secretary for the Strategic Scientific Reserve, until Howard Stark asks her for help.

includedAssets.title: Bridge and Tunnel
includedAssets.synopsis: Howard Stark's deadliest weapon has fallen into enemy hands, and only Agent Carter can recover it.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Howard Stark's deadliest weapon has fallen into enemy hands, and only Agent Carter can recover it.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Howard Stark's deadliest weapon has fallen into enemy hands, and only Agent Carter can recover it.

includedAssets.title: Time and Tide
includedAssets.synopsis: As Agent Carter closes in on Howard Stark's stolen technology, her mission threatens to unravel as Jarvis is arrested and a secret is revealed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Agent Carter closes in on Howard Stark's stolen technology, her mission threatens to unravel as Jarvis is arrested and a secret is revealed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Agent Carter closes in on Howard Stark's stolen technology, her mission threatens to unravel as Jarvis is arrested and a secret is revealed.

includedAssets.title: The Blitzkrieg Button
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy could be in more trouble than usual when fugitive Howard Stark suddenly returns for mysterious reasons.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy could be in more trouble than usual when fugitive Howard Stark suddenly returns for mysterious reasons.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy could be in more trouble than usual when fugitive Howard Stark suddenly returns for mysterious reasons.

includedAssets.title: The Iron Ceiling
includedAssets.synopsis: Carter finally gets a chance to prove herself as she is sent on a mission to Russia with Agent Thompson and the Howling Commandos.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carter finally gets a chance to prove herself as she is sent on a mission to Russia with Agent Thompson and the Howling Commandos.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carter finally gets a chance to prove herself as she is sent on a mission to Russia with Agent Thompson and the Howling Commandos.

includedAssets.title: A Sin to Err
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - A Sin to Err
includedAssets.synopsis: Carter believes that the spy that stole Stark's technology is a woman, while the SSR now knows that she is helping Stark.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carter believes that the spy that stole Stark's technology is a woman, while the SSR now knows that she is helping Stark.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carter believes that the spy that stole Stark's technology is a woman, while the SSR now knows that she is helping Stark.

includedAssets.title: Snafu
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy is cornered and vulnerable as Leviathan makes their move, while, the SSR may pay a big price as they zero in on Stark.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy is cornered and vulnerable as Leviathan makes their move, while, the SSR may pay a big price as they zero in on Stark.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy is cornered and vulnerable as Leviathan makes their move, while, the SSR may pay a big price as they zero in on Stark.

includedAssets.title: Valediction
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy faces the full fury of Leviathan, as Howard Stark makes his return. Season Finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy faces the full fury of Leviathan, as Howard Stark makes his return. Season Finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy faces the full fury of Leviathan, as Howard Stark makes his return. Season Finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy Carter to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis. Drama set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Hayley Atwell, James Dâ€™Arcy and Dominic Cooper star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he recruits Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell) to clear his name. Drama set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy Carter to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis. Drama set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Hayley Atwell, James Dâ€™Arcy and Dominic Cooper star.

includedIn.title: Marvel's Agent Carter
includedIn.synopsis: When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits his old friend Agent Peggy Carter to help clear his name, with the aid of his devoted butler, Edwin Jarvis.
